articles.content: In a key step toward ending the coronavirus pandemic, kids as young as 6 years old will be tested with the COVID-19 vaccine. The University of Oxford has launched a new study to assess the safety of … [+2534 chars]

articles.title: UK virus variant is probably deadlier, say scientists - The Indian Express

articles.content:
Written by Benjamin Mueller and Carl Zimmer
